input.descriptionHtml: Dress up your irresistibly sexy self in our Plus Size Fishnet Tights!  The gorgeous back seam detail adds an eye-catching look. Wear them with your favorite sassy costume for a great finishing touch! 100% nylon. Plus size fits most women sizes 16-20, with weight 150-220 lbs. and height between 5 ft. and 5 ft. 11" Measurements: waist 31", hips 42-46". Hand wash cold, do not bleach, drip dry, do not iron.
input.title: Women’s Black Mesh Pantyhose with Back Seam - Plus

media.alt: women& 8217 s black mesh pantyhose with back seam   plus~ua08bkpl

input.descriptionHtml:
• SPOOK-TACULAR GIFTING: Present Halloween-themed items as thoughtful gifts to friends and family, helping them add to their collection or enjoy some seasonal fun. <lt/>br<gt/>
• ORIENTAL TRADING IS YOUR ONE-STOP HALLOWEEN SHOP: From candy that makes kids shriek with delight to spine-chilling decorations and costumes, Oriental Trading has everything you need to make this Halloween an unforgettable event.<lt/>br<gt/>
• ADD TO A COLLECTION: Small items like pins, keychains and rings make a great addition to memorabilia collections or can be used to enhance a Halloween costume or your everyday look. <lt/>br<gt/>
• HALLOWEEN PARTY GAME PRIZES: Spook-filled items are a wonderful option for handing out as prizes to guests as they participate in games and activities during your Halloween festivities.<lt/>br<gt/>
<lt/>br<gt/>
Product Description:<lt/>br<gt/>
Show your fandom with your very own officially licensed Bela Lugosi Dracula Enamel Pin. This high quality, full color enamel pin with locking pin back is perfect to put on a shirt, jacket or backpack.  Bela Lugosi and Bela Lugosi as Dracula TM & © 2019 LUGOSI LLC. All rights reserved. 1 1/2" wide.
